name: CranKick
description:
Crank it like Beckham!

Fabian Fischer created the game in a personal "learn how the Playdate SDK works" jam. It's based on his previous PICO-8 mini game Footy 560, but instead of deciding when to shoot, the player has to aim using the Playdate's crank.

How to play?

This game is made for the Playdate handheld console! Please follow the sideloading instructions to get it on your device!
